title: Slow startup and slow opening e-mail from notification
body:
### Checklist

- [X] I have used the search function to see if someone else has already submitted the same bug report.
- [X] I will describe the problem with as much detail as possible.

### App version

6.400

### Where did you get the app from?

Google Play

### Android version

12

### Device model

Samsung S10 (SM-G973F/DS)

### Steps to reproduce

### When opening a message from a notification
1. Open a notification for a new e-mail
2. Wait until the message is displayed (take > 5 seconds)

### When opening the app:
1. Close all apps
2. Open k-9 mail
3. Wait until messages are displayed (see screenscast)


### What I tried so far:
For the issue about notification:
* Use an empty e-mail (except of the title) as in the screencast
* Send an e-mail from a folder or receive from a folder (same result)

In general:
* Delete all app data and reinstall completely (by using the import of e-mail configuration)
* Disabled energy saving mode

### Note
I have 4 accounts in my k9-mail (1: ~2000 e-mails, 2: ~2531 e-mails, 3: ~10 e-mails, 4: ~10 e-mails).

The issue is not new, it's like that since months (I cannot recall, but perhaps since the redesign), but I'm seriously getting annoyed by that. I thought that it will be fixed at some point.

### Expected behavior

Show almost immediately the messages.
